channel.title: [pi] mapConfig.txt
channel.description:
Hey Guys, When my client downloads my cache from my website, then it trys to extract the cache and run, i get this error. although, if i open my rsskillscache folder and go to Maps, mapConfig.txt is there :/
help please [code] RsSkills is loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\rsskillscache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:80) at client.startUp(client.java:8754) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: [pi] mapConfig.txt
item.dc:creator: @codwalkers codwalkers
item.description:
@codwalkers wrote:

i had that same issue what i did was take and re download the cache it works -.- for some reason it can get corruptedâ€¦
